page.content: man competitions. The centre can only allow 1450 people in because that is what the Centre is licensed for. Every Leisure Centre is governed by the Health and Safety rules which put a limit on spectator accomodation. More people could be allowed in if more fire exits were created. The Deputy Manager, Mr Stan Craven, likes to be able to participate. He does not like to sit behind his desk and dictate to people what they should do. He coaches squash, cicket, badminton, and gymnastics. He pointed out to have a job in this day and age, is something, but to have job satisfaction is something which people crave for. He has worked there from the very beginning when the Centre was just a shell. He has been there almost ten years
